name: Slime Highways
description:
A game about cells and cell masses. Ride the currents to eat other cells, or just enjoy life as a floating, amorphous blob. Enjoy this as a maze game or just as a screensaver.

Use arrows to shift weight in current, or to traverse walls when stuck to them.
Move away from walls or press Z to dislodge yourself into the current.

This is my entry for Ludum Dare 38! Come check out my page and vote!

This was made with PICO-8, a "fantasy console" by Lexaloffle Games. Come check out other great stuff people have made!

Check out the source here on Github!
